node.title: notification
node._create_table_statement: CREATE TABLE `notification` ( `notification_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `code` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `hourLimit` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `description` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `invalid_check` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, PRIMARY KEY (`notification_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci
